long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight extension that adds tagging functionality to your Bandcamp collection and wishlist. Organize and filter your music easily with custom tags.

Key Features:
- Add custom tags to tracks and albums
- Filter your collection/wishlist by tags
- Quick access to untagged items
- Manage tags (add, rename, delete)
- Works on both collection and wishlist pages

Important Instructions:
Before using filters, please ensure all items are loaded:
1. Click the "view all items" button at the bottom of the page
2. Scroll down until no more items appear
3. Now you can use tags effectively to filter your entire collection

Usage Tips:
- Use the "Untagged" filter to find items that need categorization
- Create tags for genres, moods, or any custom categories
- Items will stay tagged between sessions
- Tags sync across your collection and wishlist

Privacy Note:
All tag data is stored locally in your browser. No data is collected or transmitted.
